could try ibproufen if acetaminophen is no good it will over time if the baby iron is really low it will take while to get back up if supplements are added it really common for iron to drop around this age because the baby built it up from mom and now has to get it elsewhere so supplements and high iron puree and cereal is sort of the go to at this age it usually takes few days to see
